title: Warden of Vitality
content:
Warden of Vitality Level 3 Evocation Spell While this aura lasts, you can cast Restore Vitality as a bonus action to heal yourself or nearby allies. 10 turns 9m Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Warden of Vitality

Level 3 Evocation Spell

While this aura lasts, you can cast Restore Vitality as a bonus action to heal yourself or nearby allies.

Warden of Vitality is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Warden of Vitality is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemie
